original: Blum, Gustaf Adolf Mikael (Gösta), civilingenjör, Oskarström, f. 5/8/03 i Sthlm av kapten Adolf B. o. Maja Carlmark. G. 30 m. Margareta Car-lander. Barn: Johan f. 30, Gösta 32, Hans 37, Agneta 42. — Stud:ex. i Västerås 21, avg:ex. fr. KTH 26. Ing. v. Sv. väginst. 26, v. A-B Vatten-byggn:hyrån 26-29, v. Skand. Jutespinn.- & Väfveri A-B i Oskarström 29-34, fabr:chef 34-44, disp. o. verkst. dir. fr. 44. Led. av komm:fullm. i Oskarström. Medl. av Sv. tekniför. fr. 26.
translated: Blum, Gustaf Adolf Mikael (Gösta), engineer, Oskarström, born on August 5, 1903 in Stockholm, the son of Captain Adolf B. and Maja Carlmark. Married in 1930 to Margareta Carlander. Children: Johan, born in 1930; Gösta, born in 1932; Hans, born in 1937; Agneta, born in 1942. He graduated from high school in Västerås in 1921 and earned his engineering degree from the Royal Institute of Technology in 1926. He worked for the Swedish Road Institute in 1926 and the Swedish Water Building Agency from 1926 to 1929. From 1929 to 1934, he worked for Skand. Jutespinn.- & Väfveri A-B in Oskarström and became the factory manager in 1934 until 1944 when he became the managing director. He was a member of the Municipal Council in Oskarström and a member of the Swedish Society of Engineering from 1926.
